```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(clock)
data <- read_csv("wrangled_Member_Backgournd.csv")
```

```{r}
added_dates_data <- data |>
     mutate(
         starting_date = date_build(member_start_year, member_start_month, ),
         ending_date = date_build(2025, 2, 1)
     )

added_membership_duration <- added_dates_data |>
  mutate(mem_duration_month = (ending_date - starting_date) |> as.numeric() / 30)
final_data <- added_membership_duration |> mutate(present_service_deliveries_per_month = number_of_present_service_deliveries / mem_duration_month)
```

```{r}
model <- lm(mem_duration_month ~ age_years * gender * mailing_city * i_identify_as_lgbtq * i_identify_as_poc * types_of_cancer * program_interest * how_have_you_heard_of_wellspring, data=final_data)

```
